### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_amount DECIMAL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 100 WHERE order_id = 1;
